net.sourceforge.taglets.simple
Interface ShutdownSupport

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileCopier, RegexReplacer
public interface ShutdownSupport

Extended interface for SimpleTaglets.

Any simple taglet that is marked as ShutdownSupport will be called once the documentation generation is complete.

Version:
1.3 (2008/03/30 12:43:13)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.9.0

Method Summary
 void shutdown(Logger logger, File outputDirectory)
          Called once all JavaDoc documentation has been generated.
 

Method Detail

shutdown

void shutdown(Logger logger,
              File outputDirectory)
Called once all JavaDoc documentation has been generated.

Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for emiting messages.
outputDirectory - the directory the JavaDoc documentation was generated to, null if unknown.
